comments.author: The Italian Dish
comments.content: I loved this post!  We almost went to this place this summer in Seattle - I wanted to hit as many interesting food places as I could - and just did not have time for it!  So I was very interested in reading your review of this place.  I just love the idea of this mobile restaurant!

comments.author: Krista
comments.content: Just found your blog via Urbanspoon and LOVE IT. And this Airstream thing--what a GREAT idea. The poutine sounds fascinating and I'll need to keep an eye out for it on this side of the pond...

comments.author: Dicentra
comments.content: Neat!!!! I'm soooo going to look for this. How fun!
